      • retrieveEndpoint

        public void retrieveEndpoint(Object publisherEndpointUuid,
                    Reply reply)
        Description copied from interface: PublisherService
        Retrieve a PublisherEndpoint based on a String. It is recommended to pass the EndpointAdapter.uuid as a key for retrieving the Endpoint. The Reply.ok(Object) will be invoked if an PublisherEndpoint \ is found, or Reply.fail(Object) if no PublisherEndpoint is associated with the key.
        Specified by:
        retrieveEndpoint in interface PublisherService
        Parameters:
        publisherEndpointUuid - The EndpointAdapter.uuid
        reply - a Reply

        Description copied from interface: PublisherService
        When an Action is ready to be executed, send a ready message back to the client and wait for its response. The publisherEndpointUuid can be retrieved from an Envelope
